text: Blue Busking is a 2016 South Korean musical-adventure film directed by An Jae- seok. It is based on the original "Italian Traverse Band". ==Plot== The story about four friends busking while traveling on foot from Mokpo to Jarasum in 30 days to take part in a band contest. ==Cast== *Jo Han-sun as Ho-bin *Han Ji- sang as Min-woo *Park Hyo-joo as Hye-kyung *Kim Shin-eui as Young-min *Kim Jae-bum as Byeong-tae *Cho Jin-woong (special appearance) *Yang Ye-seung as Min-sook *Yoon Kyung-ho *Oh Yoo-na as Oh Yoo-na (special appearance) ==References== ==External links== * Category:2016 films Category:South Korean films Category:South Korean musical drama films Category:South Korean adventure drama films Category:2010s musical drama films Category:2010s adventure drama films Category:2016 drama films
title: Blue Busking
